participant_1.background:
I have two best friends: my dog Allie, and my own self.
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.
I sing in the shower to clear my head before I face my parents.
I quit my job without another one lined up.

participant_2.background:
I keep secrets from my parents.
I love my morning coffee and my cozy bed.
i have a lot of trophies from my childhood.
my favorite band is the muggers.
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.

content.text: My dog Allie is my best friend. She is the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.
I love my morning coffee and my cozy bed.
Those are my favorite things too! Especially when I have a long day ahead of me.
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.
That's so cool! I wish I could write like that.
I keep secrets from my parents. It's not that I don't like them, I just want to keep some things to myself.
I quit my job without another one lined up. It was a really stupid decision, but I needed a change.
I can't imagine quitting my job without another one lined up! That must have been really scary.
It was! But it ended up being the best decision for me.
